subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar’s Robert Yates Racing will let Elliott Sadler out of his contract at the end of the season. It is another blow for the Yates team, which also will lose the longtime driver Dale Jarrett and its sponsor UPS to Michael Waltrip’s new team at the end of the season.
